text: William Foster Hayes III (June 5, 1925 - January 12, 2024) was an American actor and singer. His song, “The Ballad of Davy Crockett“ hit the top of the Billboard charts in the spring of 1955. He also played Doug Williams on NBC's Days of Our Lives.
